short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Wifi and workspace info from the Airbnb search results page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We understand that for professional remote workers like you, Wifi and workspace quality at Airbnbs are as important as the location. That’s why we built Offie - to make it easier to find the best Airbnbs for remote work.

The Offie extension displays Airbnb Wifi and workspace info from the search results page.

YOUR TIME IS VALUABLE
Don’t waste time viewing the wrong listings. Quickly check if a property has good Wifi based on guest reviews.

ALL IN ONE PLACE
See Wifi speed, workspace info, and reviews in one glance. Determine if a property is suitable for your needs as a remote worker before viewing the full listing.
